events.title: LMP (Last Menstrual Period)
events.notes: Pregnancy counting started from this date.

events.title: Pregnancy Confirmation Scan
events.notes: Early scan to confirm gestational sac and heartbeat.

events.title: Dating Scan
events.notes: Confirm due date. GA approx 7-8 weeks. Fetal HR observed.

events.title: NT Scan
events.notes: Nuchal translucency scan. Fetal HR approx 159 bpm. Growth appropriate.

events.title: Tetanus Toxoid (TT) - Dose 1
events.notes: First TT dose given during pregnancy.

events.title: Estimated Due Date (EDD)
events.notes: Expected delivery date based on LMP.
